HEA_composition.elements: various dissimilar metals (composition tunable by electrode materials)
HEA_composition.support: carbon paper, filter membrane, TEM grid, Si wafer, ITO glass (depending on application)

synthesis.precursors: bulk metal electrodes as elemental sources
process_feature: composition controlled by electrode pairing and discharge parameters

TEM.size_distribution: reported from TEM statistics (exact mean values not uniformly specified)

Cs_STEM_EDX.distribution: homogeneous elemental mixing within individual nanoparticles

XPS.finding: metallic states dominate; surface oxidation suppressed by H2-containing atmosphere

ORR.quantitative_metrics: not explicitly provided in a unified form

additive_manufacturing.capability: alloy nanoparticles compatible with 3D nanostructural array fabrication

scalability.feature: broad compositional space accessible without conventional alloying constraints
